document_data.name: Slow-Butt
document_data.mainbody:
'''Slow-Butt''' was a precocious child from the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]] of [[Baldur's Gate]] in late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''I'm bored. This is boring. Everybody is boring..''|Slow-Butt}}
document_data.Description: Slow-Butt was a [[human]] boy with blush sin-kissed skin, blonde curly hair, and brown eyes.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Slow-Butt spent his days playing with fellow children of the Gate, [[Punkins]] and [[Cinnamon (child)|Cinnamon]]. The kids played [[steel watcher]]s and the spies of the [[Absolute]]. Slow-Butt was bored with the game, not getting to be the steel watcher, while his playmate were thoroughly entertained with the [[candy]] smuggling and bluffing that were parts of the game.
